pages.text: Elementally attuned herbs are rather picky about what they will grow on, as fickle as the elements themselves. Elemental Soil is a special kind of soil that can be further refined into different forms, upon which a corresponding elemental plant may grow.

$(l:herbs/infernal_bulb)Infernal Bulbs$() can grow in this magmatic soil.$(br2)Created by dropping a piece of neutral elemental soil into a pond of lava. (Such intense temperatures make this transmutation instantaneous)

$(l:herbs/dewgonia)Dewgonia$() can grow in this aquatic soil.$(br2)Created by dropping a piece of neutral elemental soil into a pond of water. (This transmutation may need some seconds to finish properly)

$(l:herbs/cloud_berry)Cloud Berries$() can grow in this air-infused soil.$(br2)Created by dropping a piece of neutral elemental soil at a really low Y level [less than 20]. (This transmutation may need some seconds to finish properly)

$(l:herbs/stalicripe)Stalicripe$() can grow in this earthen soil.$(br2)Created by dropping a piece of neutral elemental soil at a really high Y level [more than 120]. (This transmutation may need some seconds to finish properly)
